gui.strange.travel_journal.title: Travel Journal has %s entries
gui.strange.travel_journal.hold_shift_to: Hold shift and click delete to confirm.
event.strange.quests.start_not_at_scroll: You must be near a scrollkeeper when starting this quest.
event.strange.quests.crafted_all: You have crafted all items required for your quest.
event.strange.quests.gathered_all: All items of this type have been collected.
event.strange.quests.hunted_all: All targets of this type have been killed.
event.strange.quests.mined_all: You have mined all blocks required for your quest.
event.strange.quests.located_all: You have located the item required for your quest.
event.strange.quests.encountered_all: You have defeated the enemies required for your quest.
event.strange.quests.fetched_all: You have fetched all targets required for your quest.
totem.strange.returning.unbound: Shift-right click to set the totem's location
spell.strange.affect.target: Affects a target block or creature
spell.strange.affect.focus: Affects what player is looking at
spell.strange.aura.title: Aura Spell
spell.strange.blink.title: Blink Spell
spell.strange.boost.title: Boost Spell
spell.strange.drain.title: Drain Spell
spell.strange.explosion.title: Explosion Spell

spell.strange.heat.title: Heat Spell
spell.strange.knockback.title: Knockback Spell

spell.strange.lightning.title: Lightning Spell
spell.strange.portal.title: Portal Spell

spell.strange.rise.title: Rise Spell
spell.strange.roots.title: Roots Spell

spell.strange.summon.title: Summon Spell
spell.strange.boost.desc: Increases the duration and strength of all active potions effects.
spell.strange.drain.desc: Extracts health from all creatures in range and gives it to you.
spell.strange.explosion.desc: Causes an explosion at the target location.
spell.strange.freeze.desc: Lava turns to magma, water turns to ice, fires are extinguished.
spell.strange.growth.desc: Crops and grass in the area will grow.
spell.strange.heat.desc: Magma blocks turn to lava, ice melts.
spell.strange.levitate.desc: Causes the target creature to levitate.
spell.strange.lightning.desc: Causes a lightning bolt at the target location.
spell.strange.portal.desc:
If you are in the overworld, you will be teleported to the Nether.
Otherwise, you will be teleported to the Overworld.
spell.strange.repel.desc: Flings all creatures from around you.
spell.strange.rise.desc: Rises you into the air followed by a gentle descent.
spell.strange.roots.desc: Teleports to a tree that you are looking at.
spell.strange.slowness.desc: Gives slowness to the target creature.
spell.strange.summon.desc: Summons an iron golem to fight enemies around you.
